main event: A witness observed a bright circular light in the sky moving in a straight line at 1:30 AM on September 8, 1962.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 10 minutes., The light was undetectable by sound., The object disappeared in the distance., The witness had a clear visibility of the sky., There were similar sightings reported in the area at the time.
witness description: the witness and possibly a wife and brother who were also observers
